name: ghost town (itch) (magicalbitch)
description:
you're a ghost, but this time you're in a cowboy hat in a spoooOOOoooky ghost town. jk it's not that spooky. 

you can:

  • go to the saloon and listen to the player piano, sing a song, or drink a frothy cup of ale
  • find peace in the church
  • get a gold star from the sheriff (or several)
  • go to ye olde general store

it's like westworld but no plot twists or robots or sexy violence. basically it's just a ghost town.
